name: AR Plane Craze: Fun Joyride
description:
ARplane augmented reality game uplifts the gaming adventure to a whole new level. Start new gaming chapter and convert your table into real Island with flying airplane to fight your enemies. This AR game has everything for your kids to have fun time. Just grab your phone and let the real fun begin. Move around and set the best angle to get best experience.

So download this amazing Wi-Fi free best AR games with simple one touch gameplay. Let your kids fly airplane like a pro and become flying hero. Roam around because this AR game will not let kids sit still.


Features:
• Best airplane flying action simulator!
• Amazing Animations and HD graphics!
• Easy and user friendly controls of flying plane!
• Real-time thrilling adventure of jet fighter shooting and bombing!
• Simple single touch control. Tap and fly plane!
